==========================================
INSTRUCTIONS:
1. Go to Supabase Dashboard → Settings → Edge Functions → Secrets
2. Click "Add or replace secrets"
3. For each secret above:
   - Enter the Name (e.g., SKIPCASH_CLIENT_ID)
   - Paste the Value in the Value field
   - Click "Add another" to add the next one
4. After adding all 5 secrets, click "Save"

NOTE: When ready for production, change SKIPCASH_USE_SANDBOX to "false"
